channel.title: Delphi RS Client help
channel.description:
ok so i'm working on my own RS Client in Delphi, and i'm using TWebBrowser, and it works fine, and i load it up, go into rs, and that works fine but as soon as i try to leave (quit program or change page) from the game page, my whole comp crashes (like someone pulled a plug, except quickly put it back in so it starts to boot again), I'm guessing it has to do with the java, it'll load fine and i can play, its just as soon as i leave it the comp. goes... I've tried using unsigned java to see if it helped any but it still crashes. It might just be my computer, i haven't had a chance to try it on another computer, and probably won't for a while
any help would be greatly appreciated

item.title: Delphi RS Client help
item.dc:creator: @deathbyvirus deathbyvirus
item.description:
@deathbyvirus wrote:

ok so i’m working on my own RS Client in Delphi, and i’m using TWebBrowser, and it works fine, and i load it up, go into rs, and that works fine but as soon as i try to leave (quit program or change page) from the game page, my whole comp crashes (like someone pulled a plug, except quickly put it back in so it starts to boot again), I’m guessing it has to do with the java, it’ll load fine and i can play, its just as soon as i leave it the comp. goes… I’ve tried using unsigned java to see if it helped any but it still crashes. It might just be my computer, i haven’t had a chance to try it on another computer, and probably won’t for a while

any help would be greatly appreciated
